Name: Show me VR
About the game: This app allows you to transfer presentations conferences and even exhibitions into virtual reality, for a truly unique experience allows the user to upload their presentations and other documentation to view in virtual reality. All you have to do to do is register on our website and set up a conference. Show me VR is a cheaper, safer and much more convenient alternative for a gathering of any kind. Turn your presentation into an exciting VR show for your customers and partners. You can upload your own content just in 2 clicks in any format: ‚ÅÉ pdf ‚ÅÉ jpeg ‚ÅÉ any video, including 360 ‚ÅÉ ppt, pptx Invite participants or add a colleague for a joint presentation. Draw a full house and present your product or share ideas with an unlimited number of users. By the way, you don't have to leave the house for that.üôÇ We are already making presentations on the platform ‚ÅÉ Presentations and conferences of any scale ‚ÅÉ Presentations of startup projects ‚ÅÉ Development and investment projects ‚ÅÉ Visiting museums and Art galleries ‚ÅÉ Presentations by private artists and 3D creators ‚ÅÉ Sealed-bid auctions ‚ÅÉ Showroom presentations of new Auto concerns And much more Try to create and hold your first presentation in VR, and it's completely free.[/b]
